submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        imo=[0]*(k+2)
        n=len(nums)
        for i in range(n//2):
            a=nums[i]
            b=nums[n-1-i]
            if a>b:a,b=b,a
            d=abs(a-b)
            imo[0]+=1
            imo[d]-=1
            m=max(k-a,b)
            imo[d+1]+=1
            imo[m+1]+=1
        for i in range(k+1):imo[i+1]+=imo[i]
        return min(imo[:k+1])
